prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon that grants wishes, featuring a playful demeanor and a starry design.
Imagine a small, flying fairy Pokemon with shimmering wings and a joyful personality.
Show me a unique Pokemon inspired by Japanese folklore, with a starry motif and bright colors.
Design a legendary Pokemon that embodies hope and wishes, with soft features and a gentle expression.
Generate a whimsical creature that floats gracefully, adorned with ribbons and a sparkling aura.
Make a Pokemon that represents dreams and wishes, using a cute, childlike appearance with magical elements.
Give me a fairy-type Pokemon that has a celestial vibe, with a charming smile and vibrant colors.
